website_summaries.verdict: The MEElectronics Atlas offer distinctive looks, a full suite of features, and sound quality that can't be faulted at this price.
pros: The MEElectronics Atlas headphones sound very good for the price and are particularly suited to rock and dance.
The detachable cable features a flat design that's tangle-free
the volume control will work with pretty much everything
ventilated earpads mean they're good for exercising
cons: the soundstage is of the "in your head" variety and lacks detail
Sound isolation isn't as good as other headphones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome while they worked.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: decent sound, very lightweight, look cool Cons: left channel stopped working suddenly. I don't use these headphones too often, and when I do it's at a desk, not doing anything active. I took them apart and saw why the left channel stopped working - one of the wires soldered to the speaker came out of the solder. The wires are insanely thin and I don't even see the solder chunk anywhere. There are 4 terminals, two of which are already occupied, and I can't figure out which of the two I resolder back on to :-/
customer_reviews.author: Sean S.

customer_reviews.title: Buy them. They're good.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a set of headphones to use in place of earbuds which can hurt my ears and usually fall out. I saw the high rating on these Atlas headphones and ordered a pair. They are sleek looking and comfortable. The 3.5mm audio cable is seperate from the headphones which I find a little strange, but the jack stays snug inside the headphones. It has a universal volume control which will silence the noise coming into the headphones but won't lower the volume on your phone (i.e. iPhone earbuds). Good microphone as well. Well worth the small amount of money. Get these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jason McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great looks, hurts ears.
customer_reviews.text: In all honesty, if these were AROUND the ear headphones, they really would be the NEXT HEADPHONE. Amazing looks, nice foam, awesome wire, and great sound for the price! However, I had only warn the headphones for 2 hours after getting them when my ear started to HURT. I adjusted the headphones several ways, but to no avail. (To be specific, it hurt the cartilage towards the posterior part of my ear.) If you don't mind, or have smaller ears than I do, go for them. (Let it be known, my brothers in arms call me Dumbo's B**** because I have small ears!)
customer_reviews.author: Caohu09

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: At first these headphones were great, excellent sound quality and well-made. However while I'm writing this review these headphones began to show their flaws, meaning that the sound quality dropped significantly. I attempted to use different connectors, from the one in the package, hoping it was the wire and not the headphones that caused the issue. Unfortunately it wasn't and I couldn't be more disappointed. I was hoping to avoid purchasing new headphones by investing in something more expensive however these were not worth it and I feel like I wasted my money. I purchased these on August 19 and now it's September 9. I've had cheap $5 earphones last longer than these, I cannot recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: A. Siddiqui

customer_reviews.title: Decent Sounding Headphones
customer_reviews.text: This pair of headphones has a Nice sound and decent sounding bass. I really don't have anything really good or bad t say about this set of headphones as the sound is above average but certainly NOT superior. The headphones do not isolate sound when wearing them, but the sound that comes from this device is relatively good. I would recommend this pair of headphones for causal listeners. If you are intending to use these headphones for public use or for DJing, I would not recommend them. The sound is not isolated enough for that purpose. Casually wearing them and listening to them is fine and enjoyable. DJ Suspence
customer_reviews.author: TRSpencerMD

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE.
customer_reviews.text: These are great and were especially great for the discounted price. I got these for casual use when I'm at Starbucks, etc. You're not going to be wanting audiophile quality at Starbucks. For whatever reason, I've tried earbud types and they never fit right and the silicone buds always end up coming off, even with Super Glue. As an aside. I'm a part-time musician. I find it fascinating how people talk about audiophile quality speakers, headphones, etc. The most demanding music that way, is probably classical music (which I listen to). I sincerely doubt that 90% of people buying headphones would be able to tell the difference between mid-priced headphones and expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Walter E. Obrien

customer_reviews.title: Super super comfortable, they sound good and are extremely durable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these (one for me and one for my wife) 4 years ago from MEE and they are excellent value. Extremely comfortable and durable. I fly all around the world with these in my bag and they have stood the test of time. They are still going strong now. My wife uses hers every night and whilst the foam padding is wearing out, and one cable developed a fault (easily replaced), they are otherwise in perfect working order. To best way to summarise how impressed I am is to say I bought another 2 (as spares) in case they ever do break, however I have yet to open them (bought nearly 3 years ago)!
customer_reviews.author: Ian Low

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound
customer_reviews.text: The bass is amazing! I was listening to a record through my speakers, then decided to see if there was any difference with the headphones...and wow. Was there ever. I wish my speakers sounded as good as these things. I feel like I'm missing so much when I listen to anything without them. They are quite comfortable (as comfortable as an on-ear headphone can be), but like anything else, after wearing them for 10 hours straight of Skyping, my ears were a little sore. Oh, and the gray on the Orion design is a little bit lighter than pictured. Still a nice design, though - and definitely awesome sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 2 months...
customer_reviews.text: First off for 40$ one would think the sound would at least be clear and clean.. Nope.. Now I got past the not so great sound for the fack I liked the way they looked and felt. They are comfy. But here I sit, 2 months after I got them and they just died... Frankly it's not even worth me trying to see if they have a warranty at this point. I was fairly careful with them too. When I think about the fact that my last pair of cheap headphones lasted almost a YEAR and had better sound and were only 20$ this makes me think this brand is just not worth my time. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound quality and design, but a little tight.
customer_reviews.text: +Sound quality is great! +The design application is top-notch! I've had these for a few months now and the design has shown no signs of wear. +The fold-able design and disconnect-able av cable make these headphones easy to store. -Even on the larger settings these headphones are pretty tight. I found them uncomfortable to wear after a couple hours of use. Anyone who has larger ears, like me, probably should look elsewhere. -The noise isolation could be better, anything louder than 25% and the sound starts to leak.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I was kinda surprised by these the build quality is very good and they look awesome, they are smaller than anticipated and the ear cups are perforated which looks really cool but they do give me ear fatigue after an hour or two but i do have sensitive ears, the sound quality is awesome and for the money they are very good and worth it, very very cute headphones with a cool little carrying pouch, worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Zander Kane

customer_reviews.title: I Like 'Em
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered these headphones on Groupon. I accidentally sat on them and broke the left hinge. I was happy Amazon had them so I could get a replacement pair. The packaging is different but the headphones are the same. They are pretty, have a control button, and have a good sound quality. Great enough I bought the same pair twice. Be careful not to sit on them or put force on them however, it is possible they will break.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Love the size
customer_reviews.text: Love the size. Two things: (1) The cable that comes with it doesn't produce a great sound. Get the cable the other reviewer posted (it is like $8) and it changes the sound tremendously. (2) they're on-the-ear headphones and they're quite right. After a while they make my ears sore. I wear a 7 3/8 hat so I don't have a huge melon head. They're fine when I'm outside wearing a hat when I wear them over the hat. But direct contact on my ears makes me sore after about 40 minutes or so
customer_reviews.author: BryanD

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. The sound quality is great, and they block out enough just enough noise to create a pleasant listening experience, without fully cancelling all exterior sound and making you deaf to the outside world. They are extremely comfortable to wear, the adjustable parts aren't overly loose or difficult, as they are on other headphones, and the chord NEVER gets tangled. The chord remote control is nice; although I wish the volume was controlled by button press as opposed to a slider, but that's just personal preference for me. Overall a great product, and everyone loves the look of the southern California coast map on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Horowitz

customer_reviews.title: I got a good deal on these I couldnt pass up
customer_reviews.text: I got a good deal on these I couldnt pass up, They were $20 when I got them. Now only the white ones were discounted, all the other colors were $100. They have these listed as Diamond color. Now there is nothing diamond about this its all white. The sound is average only. One good thing I really like is the cord is long. I dont know how many times the cord is short. I like to stick my cell phone in my front pant pocket. So from my front pants pocket to the top of head you have some loose cord left. I like the price I got a hell of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Franck

customer_reviews.title: these are still nice for traveling as they are lightweight and fold nicely
customer_reviews.text: Okay for the price. I have since switched to Turtle Beach wireless headphones that were double the price, but worth it. That said, these are still nice for traveling as they are lightweight and fold nicely.
customer_reviews.author: k-stater4_ever

customer_reviews.title: Great set of Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a sound expert, or someone who's going to present you with a lot of sound facts or metaphors. These headphones are great. I mainly use these either to view movies on my tablet or hear some music and I have no complaints. The sound is good and strong, their is no distortion and none of that annoying feedback when you touch the headphone cord. If you were to use these headphones to speak one your cellphone or through Skype they also work and sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: I compared these to my son's Beats studio: This is what I found.
customer_reviews.text: These are passive drivers, unlike beats. The beats active circuitry increases bass response tremendously, but that doesn't mean that they necessarily sound better. In fact across the full frequency spectrum, I've found that these headphones are much smoother and responsive. They just SOUND better. The bass is much crisper and the highs definitely sound better. The beats almost sound like they wash out the mid-range, while these phones handle them extremely well. I listened to them on a long flight recently (I bought them specifically for the flight, actually) and they performed superbly!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Ayers

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful and comfortable and really
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and comfortable and really, really handy because they fold up nicely in their little bag. My only complaint is that they don't handle bass super well, and music can sound a little tinny. My music tastes run classic/prog rock and 90s alt/pop, so this isn't a super-special need for bass we're talking about, just the basics, which aren't necessarily delivered. I often think this is a weak point of moderately priced over-the-ear cushioned headphones.
customer_reviews.author: K. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife after her cheap pair wore out. I personally have a set of beats but they aren't really as good as the hype. I decided to give these a try and I'm glad I did. They strike a good balance between form and function. They sound great and they're comfortable. The design of the headphones is very sharp as well, I love the graphics and my wife did too. Would definitely recommend these to anyone looking for a decent pair of headphones
customer_reviews.author: terry

customer_reviews.title: I bought a set and they have been great can wear for hours and they don't hurt
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set and they have been great can wear for hours and they don't hurt. My wife borrowed mine and liked them enough to buy her own pair. I am extremely rough on headphones. I have been going through ear buds every six months. Just cheaper to buy a nice set like this and replace the cord every six months. Side note I get a ton of complements on the look of them. People really seem to like the look. So they work well, are comfortable, and look good for well under a hundred books its a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Butterflies!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are not only adorable, but super comfortable and work well for what I need. It does not keep out the outside noise, but, I have no problem with hearing what I'm listening to while husband is watching TV. I have had these on for well over 3 hours and they never hurt the ears or made my ears hot. Bought these when Amazon had the Prime sell going on (for $15) and they are worth every penny. Would buy again and would purchase these as gifts for others. LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones for the price, if you wait for the sale
customer_reviews.text: Here's a piece of advice: wait till they're on sale to get these headphones. They normally cost around $99, but I got them on sale for $36. They have great bass and the build quality is very good. They look sleek and they are comfortable (though my ears did start to hurt a bit after about 3 hours of wearing them). Would I pay $99 for them though? Probably not. So, like I said, just wait for them to go on sale, and you won't regret getting these one bit.
customer_reviews.author: frozennipple

customer_reviews.title: Good middle of the road buy
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't paying attention when I bought these and I have no regrets. They are cool. odd colors but not ugly. The cable is removable so you can plug in any other aux cables you might want or not. The cable has the mic and it works well with phones etc. Not for computers, you still need a normal cable with a mac and in separate. The quality is really good, nice range for general listening. The case it came with is a nice cheap little bag but it folds up nicely and fits right in. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones, but little to no low end.
customer_reviews.text: I have a large head (physically, not mentally) headphones are always an are of contention for me. Surprisingly these fit well, the adjustments offer plenty of space to fit my massive noggin between the drivers. they are sharp looking and have a beautiful finish, but the sound quality is not great. there is just no low end. I'm not looking to make my face vibrate from the bass hitting, but it would be nice to be able to hear the lower frequencies.
customer_reviews.author: E.M. Browne

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Well Balanced
customer_reviews.text: These headphones look beautiful and sound great. I own a lot of headphones and consider myself a bit of an audiophile, and while these aren't the greatest headphones on the market, they're definitely one of the best pairs in this price range. Not too heavy on the bass (if you like bass heavy headphones these aren't for you), but not tinny sounding either. I did have to fiddle with my equalizer a little to get them just right, but once I had it set these sounded fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but tad small for my ears.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great headphone. For the price that I got them at you cant beat the sound. The only problem I have found is that after roughly 30-60 minutes my ears would begin to hurt. It's too small for my ears. Or my ears are too big. I don't know. Either way, that's my only gripe. My girlfriend and my mom never had any discomfort. And they liked the design as well. In other words, they're great if it fits. They're still awesome if they don't. But the longer you wear, the more discomfort you'll get.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Contreras

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with these headphones, they work very well with mobile devices and have great sound. I find them very comfortable to wear, even over long periods. I also like how it has a replaceable cord that plugs into the headphones. Last, they fold up nicely and come with a carrier bag, which makes them easy to transport. I've had them 6 months and they are holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Mogelijk

customer_reviews.title: Kinda dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these, they had great sound and didn't hurt my ears. The biggest proble though is they seem to not be made for bigger heads like mine, everytime I used them I guess they would be pulled out. This caused the to suddenly break last week at the plastic hinge joint which means there is no easy repair. I would like to say buy them but be careful if you have a head on the bigger side.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel de Leon

customer_reviews.title: They aren't the best but they are quite good for 25 bucks
customer_reviews.text: Tried these out.. They aren't the best but they are quite good for 25 bucks. The bass is definitely present and for some it may be a little overbearing, but these headphones deliver crisp audio with clearly distinct sounds. So, when you are listening to a song you will be able to pick up the most quiet noises. If you are planning to buy these, make sure to consider other headphones first.Nonotheless, these headphones are budget-friendly and came in a nicely presentable box. Overall i would say they are a 3.9/4 out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in Every Way!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for me.. Ha! At the last moment we needed some extra presents for our "tween" daughter. She LOVES these.. I love them too! Comfortable to wear, superior sound delivery, cuts outside noise (she hasn't heard a word about doing homework or chores since getting them..). Love the options for volume etc. No wasted money on these! Awesome over ear headphones!
customer_reviews.author: ArizonaTart

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, but lots of leaking.
customer_reviews.text: I got the headphones because so many people left good reviews on them about how good the sound is and how confertable they are. And they are all very true these sound great and I can wear them for hours. But two important things I overstepped looking for headphones is sound leakage and outside noise cancelation. These leak rather badly and they let I'm tons of outside sound. The bass is pretty good in them but it could be better. Don't get me worng these are amazing headphones, but even at a low volume these leak noise, and they let tons in.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Tubbs

customer_reviews.title: Broke Quickly
customer_reviews.text: I bought these not even six months ago. Plugged them into my computer the other day, and the left speaker was dead. The wiring in the cord is already screwed up; if you so much as touch it, the sound cuts in and out. These look pretty, but they're not built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Althea Mazanowski

customer_reviews.title: On-Earphones that don't make me feel like I am wearing ear muffs.
customer_reviews.text: I picked these up so I could have a spare pair of earphones for the office. They are the most comfortable pair of earphones I have tried. I wear them all the time and seldom feel like I have strapped a couple of heaters to my ears. They breathe well and the sound is decent. They were definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Withey

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones because they had good reviews and seemed like a great pair of headphones for the price. They do have an awesome sound and I have no complaints there. The only reason why I won't give this a five star review is because after an hour or so of continuous use, your ears start to have a little discomfort. Now, by no means would I not recommend these headphones it was just something I wanted to let people know if they plan on wearing these headphones for a long period of time over and over again. Still a great pair for a fair price. Also, the design and color on the Atlas Carbon are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: the sound is far better then expected from a 20$ head set
customer_reviews.text: the sound is far better then expected from a 20$ head set. its NOT studio quality sound but its very very very very good. quality befitting a 200$ head set. this is more comfortable then my bose oe2 and it sounds much better with surprising bass, it make me jump first time i put them on. again these arent studio quality meaning that they arent 100% sound accurate but even so they are amazing and i will be recommending them to anyone i know looking for amazing headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Thor B.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money-JUNK
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was such a great set of headphones. The sound was great. Then after the 30 day warranty they started going out. Some times they work, sometimes you can't hear a thing. If you put your finger on the volume control just right you can hear it off and on. Truly disgusted with these headphones. But the 30 day warranty ran out a week ago so I am stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: gb reader

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Update 1/3/16: They worked for about 6 months and then died, I was very disappointed Great fit, wonderful sound, perfect for traveling. Lightweight, great coloring on the item, and the sound quality is much better than I anticipated. They are easily adjustable and super comfy. A great product, with wonderful tone for a much more reasonable price than some other headphones on the market today.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Grossi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hewdphones cant complain.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. For how inexpensive these headphones are theyre immaculant. They sound amazing. There's only 1 thing that I've found wrong with them and its that the adjustments for the ear length is a little loose. It doesn't move at all but when you want it to move to adjust them its a little loose.
customer_reviews.author: Nyko

customer_reviews.title: Great audio quality
customer_reviews.text: Great audio quality, good build quality, and I LOVE the fact that the cable is so easily replaceable for the user. Plus, they're available CHEAP. You could spend weeks comparing and contrasting different headphones, or you could just get these and start enjoying your music now.
customer_reviews.author: D. Haines

customer_reviews.title: Son Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a birthday present for my 10 y/o son. He's really enjoying them and I've borrowed them a few times. Nice for the music that he listens to, with a bit of pronounced bass. Good sound for the price, but I think the mids and highs sound a little better on my daughter's retro looking Panasonic cans. Both are great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Wawro Family

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 out of 5 please read first
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Great sound better than beats and lower distortion than equivalent - Great feel and fit -Great look because of design and not too cumbersome looking like most on ear headphones Cons -The AUX cable supplied in box is CRAP. Like it was made in a completely different factory !!!! Connects to iPhone 6 and the slightest movement triggered Siri or worse skipped/sped up the track I was listening to. Get another cable or buy one on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Shehab Kamal

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy that for $40 dollars!
customer_reviews.text: All BS and jargon aside: I don't know even the basics of audio engineering or what/why some headphones sound better than others but my bottom line - these are amazing headphones. I purchased them at the $99 rate and even now seeing this price, it was worth it. They are comfy, great-looking, and sound fantastic. Very noticeable difference from standard headphones included with smart devices and all that jazz. For $40 it would be crazy not to get these if you are in the market. I can hear things I missed in music for years and oddly enough, it is like learning my favorite songs all over again. Great headphones - great price - great Scott....
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed because they look great and feel great on
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these a little over a year ago. Within a few weeks, the audio port in the left earphone wasn't making proper contact, making the left side cut in and out. I was disappointed because they look great and feel great on, and the sound quality was pretty great for the price I got them for...for the short time they worked properly. At about the same time, I also purchased a pair of the JVC nanotubes - cheaper and just as good sound quality. No operational/durability issues with the JVCs - I would recommend them prior to purchasing the MEE Atlas.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: The Best!!!!!!! :)
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are superb! I love the looks and the sound is excellent. Very clear and crisp! And the ear pads are very soft and comfortable on the ear. I've worn them for over two hours and didn't suffer from any ear shell discomfort. Great headphones all around!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Beach Mommy to 3

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice...
customer_reviews.text: Very cool looking and confortable if you use it for a small period of time. As many on-ear headphones it starts to hurt after a while, even when the material on the ear cups is very soft. This is not the headphone you want to use in the subway on your way to work there is no sound isolation and if you crank the volume high enough everyone around you will start hearing
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jean

customer_reviews.title: great headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are great, and iif highly recommend them for their comfortably and sound quality! HOWEVER the cord broke easily by the earcup, and i am extremely careful and gentle with my electronics. I was shocked it didn't break earlier given how little wear and tear i put on it. Had to buy a 3rd party replacement cable.
customer_reviews.author: BMXmike78

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite headphones. We have several different headphones in our ...
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite headphones. We have several different headphones in our house and these are my least favorite. The are not all that comfortable and the sound isn't as nice as a less expensive pair of my daughter's headphones. The style is cute. They seem pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: D. DuBord

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones (Small, but pack a huge punch)
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are simply AMAZING. They were very cheap when I got them, and came brand new from the factory in a sleek and stylish box. My first impression was that they were quite small for full powered, high-end headphones, but once you put them on, you'll see. They packa big punch especially with the strong bass. PROS- Cheap Reliable Good Customer Service Strong Bass Stylish Wicked Comfortable Very HD Sound CONS- Will Slip off your head if you are 0-20 Years old Leaks Sound Slightly to those around you
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Marias

customer_reviews.title: They're fine; nothing special
customer_reviews.text: These are ok as far as over the ear headphones go. I had to replace the aux cable that came with them after a few months. The company sent me a free replacement chord. It died again and this time I just replaced it myself. While the sound quality is fine, they are certainly nothing close to noise cancelling. I wouldn't recommend them if you want them to drown out any sort of background nose. I mostly use them for video gaming purposes now and they serve the purpose. I probably wouldn't recommend them, honestly. I'd imagine you can find better ones for a similar price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headphones and I made for each other
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. I love the feel of them on my ears. It drowns enough outside sounds for me. The design is great. I got the diamond ones - they match my new i-Mac. I am more than happy and would buy another pair at the drop of a hat.
customer_reviews.author: Monk

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Build is on the cheap side, I guess. Not as good on sound insulation. I can hear my kids talking with this on. I am keeping it due to it has a very nice sq. Airy top end. Midrange not as warm as the Martin Logan Mikro 90, bass is definitely there and plenty of it. I can see why people like this headphone. And for the price, I don't blame them. I wish the pouch is a better quality, but can't get everything.
customer_reviews.author: Engster

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Value
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is excellent for my needs. I work in an office and use these to listen to music or video while working so as not to disturb others. So, if you are looking for something that competed with Beats, then i cannot compare. Great for light or office use.
customer_reviews.author: AR GT

customer_reviews.title: Good Until They Broke
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were good until they broke two months outside of the Amazon return limit. They worked for two months and then they broke suddenly. They only have audio in one ear. It appears to be a cable problem. I would change the cable except it is a $20 product.
customer_reviews.author: Ceci A.

customer_reviews.title: I love them if they still worked
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of home for me since moved out of CA. However, about 6 months in of careful use the wire next to where it plugs into a device became loose and now I can't use them because the sound is mostly not there. It's too bad because I loved them otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and sound
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son for Christmas. They were on his wish list. They fit well and have a good sound, the only thing he doesn't like is that you can hear what he is listening to, which won't work so well when on a plane.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are great headphones. They look amazing (i got the white ...
customer_reviews.text: They are great headphones. They look amazing (i got the white ones) and they feel like they are made with good material. I gave it a 3 star because you can still hear so much when you have them on. A lot of background noise gets through. The sound quality is good but not great. you get what you paid for. I use them when I play games and I can wear them for hours without them hurting my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, dropped not even 2 feet at gym ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, dropped not even 2 feet at gym where the slide off my head, broke in half. The whole thing is held together with a tiny pin in a tiny plastic whole.. Also the chord is waay too short. Save your money , wish I did
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, very comfortable but leaks everything and poor ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, very comfortable but leaks everything and poor low end/bass response. You can hear everything 5ft away. Overpriced in my view. Headphones are one of those products that's risky to purchase online they need to be tried for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Leif Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy packed and comfrotable.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are comfortable, clear and break down for easy travel. The mic is loud, allowing the person on the other end to easily hear me. I especially like the detachable cord and break down style of the headphones themselves allowing for easy transport.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gaddis

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, sounds great, but I was hoping for a little more noise isolation though. You can hear right through them, which may be good for some people but that's not why I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: great quality for the price, amazing colors and nice sound, however isolation is average and on higher volumes can be heard easily in a semi quiet room, might be less noticeable outdoors in a crowd
customer_reviews.author: nick t

customer_reviews.title: These are a great buy if you are like me and cannot tolerate ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a great buy if you are like me and cannot tolerate in ear buds. They definitely do not block out much outside sound but they were perfect for a long plane ride. The sound quality is very nice for the price. I happily listen to my shows with these while my husband watches TV next to me with no problems. They are also very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: KristenM

customer_reviews.title: Ears a bit tender the first day but have been just fine since then
customer_reviews.text: No problems at all with deliver or use. Ears a bit tender the first day but have been just fine since then. Good sound. Good price. Glad I did it. Looks kinda cool, too. Music comes through nicely bass and all. Audio books just fine. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Polly B

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Sounds and looks good, but it hurts after wear. I don't know if it's because of my big ears, but looks are not worth the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Diana C

customer_reviews.title: They have amazing quality sound
customer_reviews.text: They have amazing quality sound, fit nicely and comfortably, and they are a great style. However they let a lot of sound leak right through them and the build quality makes me feel like I wouldn't want to test the durability. Great buy overall.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: These worked fine for a little over a month then the right ...
customer_reviews.text: These worked fine for a little over a month then the right hand speaker stopped working. The sound was quite good for the price, with decent separation and reasonable bass. The construction is of hard hollow feeling plastics and the build quality does feel cheaper than the mainstream brands.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R. Hall

customer_reviews.title: but wanted something more comfortable and thought I would splurge
customer_reviews.text: Have always used inexpensive earbuds, but wanted something more comfortable and thought I would splurge. I realize that you can spend substantially more for headphones, but this was a lot for me. I am very happy with them. They are comfortable, the sound is good, and, as a bonus, they're quite attractive. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CGT

customer_reviews.title: Cnet was right, great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and bass response. Used for watching TV while the wife is sleeping and while cutting the grass connected to IPod Classic. Its amazing the things you hear with these on while watching TV. Has brought a new dimension to my fav shows.
customer_reviews.author: BigPapaBrian

customer_reviews.title: The headphones too tight hurts your ears they should of ...
customer_reviews.text: The headphones too tight hurts your ears they should of made it go over your ears then the product would be amazing
customer_reviews.author: Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the $
customer_reviews.text: Got these on "Lightning Deals", the were a steal. Nice case included as well. Don't sound like top-of-the-line headphones, but better than anything else similarly priced.
customer_reviews.author: DarenLewis

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound for the money. Just enough cord for me. The rocker volume switch is good because android phones get no love as far as mobile phones buttons working. They don't keep out sound at all so if you have a noisy commute these may not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound, but product doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound but cable connection to left ear broke after 6 months of daily use. Can hear great from the right side but the left fades in and out with any motion.
customer_reviews.author: aluna cen

customer_reviews.title: My teenager loved these headphones
customer_reviews.text: My teenager loved these headphones. He bragged about the style, comfort and sound quality and they quickly became his favorite. However, there appears to be a short in one of the cables and they were unusable after only 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty C.

customer_reviews.title: They look pretty and the cushions fit my ears very comfortably
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited when I got these. They look pretty and the cushions fit my ears very comfortably. But after about two weeks, they left side started to go out. It's something in the wires. I have to constantly move the wire to get the left side to work. I'm really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I got these headphones for my sister and she really ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones for my sister and she really loves them. She mentions them every time I see her.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Wessel

customer_reviews.title: recommended on-the-ear headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones, they have above average sound and above average build quality, on the ear makes your ears sore (or at least mine) after an hour or two of listening, but that's nitpicking. The all white ones are already showing little scratches, but I'm ok with that. Very good overall for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Murphy

customer_reviews.title: ... for my daughter and myself and the sound is great. Now I listen to the radio more because ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two headphones for my daughter and myself and the sound is great. Now I listen to the radio more because the music motivates me to even exercise more, Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl D. Milton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for the first while, but the headphones broke at the joint and it seems that once that happened the speaker wires also became disconnected. The joint portion really needs more reinforcement.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: They sound ok, bought to use with xbox one ...
customer_reviews.text: They sound ok, bought to use with xbox one since they match my forza custom edition. Mic works perfectly but sound is lacking, also smaller then i thought.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: These headphones were great for the period they lasted me unfortunately the little ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were great for the period they lasted me unfortunately the little platic part where u fold them at eventually breaks
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Perez

customer_reviews.title: ... pairs of headphones and these have clear sound and good bass. The built looks a little flimsy becausee ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs of headphones and these have clear sound and good bass. The built looks a little flimsy becausee everything is plastic, but I have not problems with it because I am normally gentle when I use things
customer_reviews.author: Philo Chung

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sadly these lasted about 2 months before one side completed died. Definitely NOT worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, but the cable broke quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I love the headphones, but I got them and after only a month the cable started to break. The plastic started to peel off the ends and the sound started to have a loud buzzing. The headphones are great, but the cable is broken and doesn't work. Other than that, the design is very cool looking and I love the feel of them. They are some of my favorite headphones.
customer_reviews.author: P. Layer

customer_reviews.title: its sound great and a great buy
customer_reviews.text: this headphone is great, it has a lot of bass, more than my liking, but it has great clarity which i like. i think the vocal got push behind the music a bit but you cant have everything. like look nice sounds great; have paid more for a lower quality sound headphones dislike hurt my ear after a couple hour of used sound leak + cable died after one day use...however meelectronics send a replacement cable...received today...hope it lasted
customer_reviews.author: Paulx

customer_reviews.title: I like the design
customer_reviews.text: I like the design, the color, the way it fits on my head. I don't like that sometimes it plays louder in the left ear.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Miletic

customer_reviews.title: These work great with my phone and iPad
customer_reviews.text: These work great with my phone and iPad, but I get odd distortion when they're plugged into my computer.
customer_reviews.author: CW_Indy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones especially for the Price
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound great, just as good if not better than the Monster DNA headphones I also purchased. They are not falling apart like the Monster DNA headphones have done in the almost exact same amount of usage. The MEElectronics also cost much less. Very happy with these headphones and would recommend over the Monster DNA's anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Forseth

customer_reviews.title: Pinches my head like it's trying to squeeze my brains out like in ...
customer_reviews.text: Pinches my head like it's trying to squeeze my brains out like in that episode of Game of Thrones where the guy gets his eyes squished in, but this time it's the ears. Otherwise the sound quality isn't bad.
customer_reviews.author: Azin

customer_reviews.title: MEE earbuds good - MEE phones bad.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, but sounds thin and lifeless. I'll stick with Sennheiser from now on. I also have MEE brand earbuds that I do like, BTW, but no these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: P. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing but very disappointing hardware.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones worked for about 3 months. First, the right side lost the ability to produce sound, then the left. Everything on the outside looks beautiful and sturdy, but whatever inner wiring exists is probably extremely flimsy. They were very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Son felt these were a little too snug on his ...
customer_reviews.text: Son felt these were a little too snug on his head. He is twenty. We returned them for some different headphones.
customer_reviews.author: B. Feely

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable on my ears :/
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is descent...nothing too special. Microphone works fine for taking call. I personally found these headphones to be uncomfortable. The ear piece are smaller than I thought they were and did not fit comfortably on my ears. I prefer my $30 apple earbud style headphones over these. Maybe these headphones will fit my 10-year old nephew more comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: bburkhead12345

customer_reviews.title: Goo for the momey, not great on the ear headphones
customer_reviews.text: Fair purchase headphones, these phones are good for the price, with fair bass response. The bass is not boomy and fairly tight. The midrange is OK, and the high end is nice. These phones lean towards a warm sound, fair projection. They aren't the loudest phones I've ever used. I am unsure about the construction.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I really like these headphones. I don't have a lot to compare them to but the sound is great and they are comfortable. I did buy a different pair of headphones and took them back because they hurt my head.
customer_reviews.author: Lori in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Look better than they are.
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable to wear for any length of time. Sound quality is OK. I'm happier with ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: critic

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I liked the headphone very much. What I liked: sound quality, base and very light. and You can identify combination of a rythm easily :) what I didn't like: it makes ear bit painful especially when using it continually. and the mic wont work with Windows laptops "As I tried" but pretty awesome with my iOS device. I wonder if there is anyway to make the mic work with my Laptop. Very elegant product especially with price I bought was $64 :))
customer_reviews.author: Fawaz Abdul rahman

customer_reviews.title: I am sad!
customer_reviews.text: After a few months, one speaker went out! This was a birthday present for my daughter, and now she is heartbroken. We bought these headphones, because of the ratings. I am sad!
customer_reviews.author: Michaelann Leary-Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones with nice design and the best sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love the design , the sound quality is awesome. Too bad my husband stole it from me to play his Counter strike game.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Navickaite Momchilova

customer_reviews.title: Quality and great sound
customer_reviews.text: Durable, good quality. The sound is amazing and they feel good on too.
customer_reviews.author: Cass Alexander

product_meta.title: MEE audio Atlas Sky IML Graphics On-Ear Headphones with Headset Functionality
product_meta.description: Color:SkyTechnologically advanced headphones meld the future and present, providing exceptional sound and style. Advanced audio design for impressive bass, clarity, and spaciousness for extreme audio enjoyment. High quality graphics design combine exquisite graphics with a flawless finish for stunning looks. Inline microphone, remote, and universal volume control for headset use. This is a product of MEE audio (formerly MEElectronics).
feature_bullets: Single-sided detachable flat cable for longevity and convenience; includes 1-year manufacturer’s warranty
High-definition headphones deliver clear and detailed sound with plenty of bass
Built-in microphone, remote, and universal volume control for headset use
Lightweight on-ear construction with ergonomic ear pads ideal for use on the go
Striking designs with high-resolution IML graphics embedded into the headphones

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars459 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
